name: fluid
description: Rapid Application Development for a more... civilized age.

scripts.start:
coffee --watch --compile fluid.coffee tests.coffee & 
jade --pretty --watch --out dist index.jade
scripts.dist-scripts: cat lib/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js lib/material-design-lite/material.min.js lib/lodash/lodash.min.js lib/knockout/dist/knockout.js lib/marked/marked.min.js lib/diecut/diecut.js lib/jsstyles/dist/jss.min.js lib/Faker/build/build/faker.min.js lib/codemirror/lib/codemirror.js lib/coffee-script/extras/coffee-script.js fluid.js codemirror-mode.js > dist/fluid.js
scripts.dist-styles: cat lib/material-design-lite/material.min.css lib/codemirror/lib/codemirror.css lib/codemirror/theme/eclipse.css fluid.css > dist/fluid.css
scripts.dist: npm run compile-coffee && npm run compile-jade && npm run dist-scripts && npm run dist-styles
scripts.compile-compile: coffee --compile tools/compile.coffee && echo "#!/usr/bin/env node" | cat - tools/compile.js > bin/compile && chmod u+x bin/compile
scripts.test: npm run compile-coffee && node tests.js | faucet
scripts.coverage: npm run compile-coffee && istanbul cover tests.js
scripts.coveralls: npm run compile-coffee && istanbul cover tests.js --report lcovonly && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls

author: Prithvi Prabhu <prithvi@h2o.ai> (http://h2o.ai/)
